text:
HOLLYWOOD, CA - MAY 10: Actor Bryan Cranston attends the "All The Way" Los Angeles Premiere at Paramount Studios on May 10, 2016 in Hollywood City. (Photo by Kevin Winter/Getty Images)

From the “Late Late Show“, Bryan shows us the best way to annoy the ever living daylights out of James Corden. Look, a regular Elf on the Shelf is already creepy enough. But what if that Elf comes to life and terrorizes James at every turn?

Take a look and see for yourshelf! <—- See what we did there??!
title: WATCH: Bryan Cranston is the (super creepy) Elf on the Shelf
